Download CV
About me

I am an enthusiastic UI/UX designer based in Germany, with a rich experience of over 3.5 years in website, mobile app & product design.

I design professional & beautiful websites

With years of experience in mobile app and web design I have mastered the skills of understanding client requirements according to the latest trends. I have worked with  different projects so you can rely on me for yours. Adept at collaborating with developers and other team professionals to achieve high goals and deadlines.

I’ve spent most of these years working across different areas of design like front-end  development, landing pages, app UI/UX, bringing forth a commitment to creating a robust design that enhances productions, strengthens characters, and entices viewers. Having worked on various projects that are already live, I can help you with the best possible suggestions and ideas that we can proceed with. With me, you aren’t forced to accept anything. I give you a variety of options we can work on together.

Read More

What I do

From understanding  the user requirements, designing a wireframe and delivering the final design, I do everything that falls in between these lines.

UI Design

An effective user interface design is what captures attention and spreads a clear message. I make sure the design is innovative and neat with all of this.

Ux Design

Experience of all UX processes like UX research, User Flows, wireframes, Mockups and rapid prototypes for Mobile Apps and Websites

WEB Development

If you are looking for a developer who’ll take over the research and development of your website, I am a well-established professional to help you with this.

SRH Hochschule Heidelberg

UI/UX Designer

The main objective of the Master Thesis was to deliver a solution to customers who find it difficult to find a parking spot. Designed Wireframing and Prototyping of mobile app using various Design Tools and Design Patterns.

2016 - 2018

Future It Solutions

Web Designer

I was responsible for client-based web design and development assignments. Working on Interaction Design such as button, labels, images, typography and icons, animations and behavior of design I take pride in having helped the best of clients and getting maximum ratings for the company.
